scripts.test: htmlhint www/index.html desktop_www/viewer.html && eslint app.js packaging/ www/js desktop_www/js && stylelint "www/scss/custom/*.scss" "desktop_www/scss/*.scss" --syntax scss
scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others "npm run watch-css" "npm run watch-www-css" "cross-env NODE_ENV=development electron ."
scripts.pack:osx: npm run build-css && npm run build-www-css && ./node_modules/.bin/electron-packager . $npm_package_productName --app-version=$npm_package_version --version=0.37.7 --out=builds --ignore='assets' --ignore='builds' --ignore='packaging' --ignore='www/node_modules' --ignore='www/package.json' --ignore='(.*).git(.*)' --ignore='(.*).map' --ignore='(.*)scss' --ignore='iGurbani.sqlite' --ignore='README' --platform=darwin --arch=x64 --asar=true --icon='assets/STTM3.icns' --overwrite && cp iGurbani.sqlite builds/SikhiToTheMax-darwin-x64/SikhiToTheMax.app/Contents/Resources/iGurbani.sqlite && npm run sign:osx
scripts.pack:win: npm run build-css && npm run build-www-css && ./node_modules/.bin/electron-packager . $npm_package_productName --app-version=$npm_package_version --version=0.37.8 --out=builds --ignore='assets' --ignore='builds' --ignore='packaging' --ignore='www/node_modules' --ignore='www/package.json' --ignore='(.*).git(.*)' --ignore='(.*).map' --ignore='(.*)scss' --ignore='iGurbani.sqlite' --ignore='README' --platform=win32 --arch=x64 --asar=true --version-string.CompanyName='Khalis, Inc.' --version-string.LegalCopyright='Copyright (C) 2017 Khalis, Inc.' --version-string.FileDescription=$npm_package_productName --version-string.OriginalFilename='SikhiToTheMax.exe' --version-string.InternalName=$npm_package_productName --version-string.ProductName=$npm_package_productName --version-string.ProductVersion=$npm_package_version --icon='assets/STTME.ico' --overwrite && cp iGurbani.sqlite builds/SikhiToTheMax-win32-x64/resources/iGurbani.sqlite && cd builds && zip -rq -X sttme-win32-$npm_package_version.zip SikhiToTheMax-win32-x64
scripts.dist:osx: npm run pack:osx && cd builds/SikhiToTheMax-darwin-x64 && rm -f ../sttme-$npm_package_version.zip ../SikhiToTheMax-$npm_package_version.dmg && zip -ryq -X ../sttme-$npm_package_version.zip SikhiToTheMax.app && ../../node_modules/.bin/electron-installer-dmg SikhiToTheMax.app SikhiToTheMax --icon='../../assets/STTM3.icns' --out=../ --overwrite && mv ../SikhiToTheMax.dmg ../SikhiToTheMax-$npm_package_version.dmg && npm run upload:osx
scripts.watch-css: nodemon --watch desktop_www -e scss -x "node-sass --output-style nested --source-map true --include-path desktop_www/scss desktop_www/scss/viewer.scss desktop_www/css/viewer.css"
scripts.watch-www-css: nodemon --watch www -e scss -x "node-sass --output-style nested --source-map true --include-path www/scss www/scss/foundation.scss www/css/bundle.css"
